open parentheses table row straight a 4 row cell negative 1 end cell straight c end table close parentheses plus open parentheses table row 2 straight b row straight d cell negative 3 end cell end table close parentheses equals open parentheses table row 1 cell negative 3 end cell row 3 4 end table close parentheses open parentheses table row 0 1 row 1 0 end table close parentheses
